resources.string: The main screen shown when the app is opened. User can select the Now playing option and see the song playing in the background. Library option is to see the tracks stored in the device. Search is for searching a particular title. And settings is for the user to set preferences.
This screen displays the current playing track along with the player controls
This screen allows users to select a track based on artists or albums, or the user can select a previously created playlist
User can search for a song stored in the device.
Displays the various settings for customizing the UI, player behaviour etc.
Displays tracks based on file names
Displays previously created playlists. User can play, edit or delete a playlist
